briefTitle: A Multicenter Extension Study of Taliglucerase Alfa in Pediatric Subjects With Gaucher Disease
officialTitle: A Multicenter Extension Study of Taliglucerase Alfa in Pediatric Subjects With Gaucher Disease
summary: A protocol to extend the assessment of the safety and efficacy of taliglucerase alfa in pediatric subjects (2 to \<18 years old) with symptoms and clinical manifestations of Gaucher disease who completed treatment in Protocols PB-06-002 (switchover study from imiglucerase) or PB-06-005 (naÃ¯ve treatment with taliglucerase alfa).
